comment.text:
Cons:Our server made 3/4 of our drinks and left without telling us, and then I had to find the "bartender" to ask who we should pay. 

I'd suggest hiring a real bartender and CARRYING Knob Creek if it's one of your 9 cocktails. My chicken and waffles ($23) were sent back bc they didn't season the chicken and the waffles were cold. This was after they brought everyone's food but mine, it wasn't worth waiting 13 minutes - 5 patrons in the restaurant 

Website doesn't have the same menu as the restaurant 

If this is going to be labeled a "hotel restaurant" the prices are appropriate, but if they're trying to make a name for themselves it's only a matter of time before it's closed 

Good things: the poutine  interior

owner_replies.comment:
Thanks for your feedback. The poutine is indeed my personal favorite as well.
I am sorry that the overall experience was not the same.
We appreciate that you stopped by and we would love to get some additional feedback.
If time allows, please contact our Food & Beverage Director Okan or myself at 678-412-2400
Much appreciated.
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: One of the best outdoor spots in Atlanta. Good food, friendly service. I highly recommend the Rowdy Tiger

owner_replies.comment: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

comment.text: Worst service I've ever seen at a Marriott property! Lazy bartender with an attitude. 5 people outside and no service after 15 minutes. Hello

I have not logged into Yelp in years, but I had to sign in to write about how great this place is. 

We came to the Rowdy Tiger on a lark on one of the worst weather nights I've ever had in Atlanta, but they took care of us. I cannot say enough about the exemplary service, truly special stuff here (extra special shout out to our server, Tony!). The cocktails were phenomenal, and the food was spot-on. I split the salmon salad thing with my mother-in-law, and I've never had salmon seasoned so well. My favorite dessert in the world is bread pudding, and Rowdy Tiger's bread pudding is up there with the best - baked and served in its own small cast iron skillet (!!). The ambiance is great - the space is broken up by big dividers, so the sound never gets too loud. The decor is modern without being annoyingly trendy. STRONG recommend

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your visit and strong recommendation. We appreciate the detailed positive feedback, which has been shared with our team. The team is delighted that you enjoyed the experience and look forward to your next visit. 
Stay well, 
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Food was very good and the service was impeccable!  Highly recommended.  I got the avocado toast and fried green tomatoes.

owner_replies.comment:
We are glad you enjoyed the avocado toast and friend green tomatoes, two local favorites.
Thank you for your commentary and stopping by.
See you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
Just dined with a group of friends. We had the pleasure of having Neicy as our server.    I started with a deliciously smooth whiskey cocktail- vieux something. The pork belly Mac and cheese was yummy as were the fried green tomatoes. A few of us ordered salads. The greens were super fresh and crisp. 

Throughout the service, Neicy was very attentive but not in an obtrusive way. I'd recommend this place to friends. Go try it!

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate you and your friends. Thank you for your feedback and recognition. 
Recommendations like yours mean truly a lot to our team.
We look forward seeing you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: In one word...AMAZING. From the the service...thanks Tony,  to the Peach Bourbon Smash to the Croissant Bread Pudding. AMAZING!

photos.caption: Mac n cheese with bourbon chicken

owner_replies.comment:
The Low Country Cioppino is one of my personal favorites as well. Thank you for the recognition and the visit.
We hope to see you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
I guess I have always expected a lot better from this location but again disappointed. For the price the beef short ribs were not worth it. They were tender but I guess the server too a while as they were cool by the time I ate them. There was not enough sauce for the mashed potato and it had no flavor.

Disappointed...

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your comments and your visit. We consistently have received great comments about our amazing short ribs, so we are extremely sorry that yours were under expectation. If time allows, please give us call, as we want to inquiry about some additional details and provide corrective action as necessary.
We would sincerely appreciate it.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager
.

comment.text: So it's been nearly a month later and after NICOLE stole money off my card and the manager stated my funds would return the same business day well it's been a month later and my bank confirmed they are giving me only half my funds back . This place is a scam

My friend and I came for a last minute birthday celebration for her this past Sunday, with about an hour and a half before closing time. We sat at the bar and was immediately greeted by Raymond. He was super kind and made us a "special drink" which was delicious. Even though we were told that the kitchen was closed, he/they still managed to snag us some fries so we didn't have to drink on an empty stomach. I am most definitely looking forward to coming back.
I don't usually leave five star reviews, or reviews for any reason, but the customer service was outstanding. Raymond even gave us a hug before we left! Such a sweetheart. 
The overall aesthetic of the restaurant was attractive and gave me upscale vibes but not too snooty.
10/10 recommend

owner_replies.comment:
We are thrilled that you stopped by and enjoyed the experience. Thank you for recognizing Raymond.
We truly look forward to your next visit.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: The menu was very limited and just "ok". The Bourbon Short Ribs were bland and lacked a "Bourbon" taste. Our food came out cold and we had to send it back. The first time I've bc ever been served cold foog from anywhere. The dessert was nasty. I had Peaches and Cream Panna Cotta and it literally tasted like peaches from a fruit cup dumped on top of some bland custard with toasted almonds on top. My girlfriend had the Banana Pudding and it was watery like before you actually let the pudding part gel overnight. The drinks were,however, very good. Overall I did not enjoy it enough to want to come back.

Stayed two nights at the hotel - had a wonderful dinner at the restaurant with a fabulous whiskey/scotch list. The seafood stew was fabulous!
The real highlight of the trip though was breakfast and the absolutely amazing service. I had the pleasure of dining in Mahelet's section and she was a breath of fresh air - absolutely a great way to start the day! She's kind and funny and warm - just fantastic. Made me feel like home away from home. Both Mahelet and Ohan recognizes me the second morning and we enjoyed wonderful conversation. Such a treat to have such pleasant interactions in the morning - especially when traveling alone. Well done!

owner_replies.comment:
Awesome news and I will share your comments with these two great Ambassadors of our Rowdy Tiger restaurant. We thank you for your loyalty and frequent visits during your stay at adjacent the Renaissance.
The team looks forward seeing you again in the future.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail"
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: We had to find someone to seat us. The person who sat us was also our server and seemed very put out with having to wait on us.  Then one person in our party found pieces of steel wool in his waffle. They did at least comp his meal and took some extra off. Manager couldn't be bothered to even come speak to us. Food wasn't that great.

Rowdy had a great chicken & waffles. The chicken was seasoned well & Johnny was an amazing bartender! he gave me an wonderful recommendation on drinks & food. He was also incredibly quick with fast delivery and made sure i was always comfortable with my order.

Walked in on a casual Tuesday evening, and the service was subpar. Had a business meeting that evening, and our drinks felt like they took an eternity. The rooftop I'm sure if a very cool spot, but the service just was not ideal at all.

Upstairs bar is absolute dog water. Took half a coons to get drinks. No music at all and the bartender told me "that shit gives me a headache". Nobody upstairs on a Saturday night for a reason. The bartenders need tips and provide horrible service, makes 0 sense

Came here for brunch with my boyfriend on Sunday. Our server Johnny was really great. He recommended us the Crispy Buttermilk Fried Chicken Sandwich and the Rowdy Tiger Breakfast Short Rib. Both were absolutely amazing! The buttermilk fried chicken and the fries were super crispy. My boyfriend got an old fashion while I got a cocktail called Ophelia. They were both strong and delicious! We will definitely be returning again!

The ambiance is nice, the management staff was attentive and our server was cool. The food, meh. Our appetizer came out after our meals, which the management and server made the wrong a right and comp'd us the app...which I appreciated. They have really interesting whiskey options of which I had a 1 oz pour of a Japanese whiskey and I enjoyed it. Next time I just plan to hang at the bar and try their whiskey flights.

owner_replies.comment:
We look forward to your next visit at the bar and so appreciate your feedback from your last visit.
We will share your comments with the team. Thank you for visiting.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: This place was horrible. We made a reservation which took them 15 minutes past the time our reservation was made for to seat us. Took them about 20 mins before we were asked what we wanted to drink. We ordered a Bloody Mary that took 20 another minutes to arrive, then we ordered our food, waited for an hour and 30 mins more before we walked out and left after our waiter told us he wasn't sure when our food would be out.

owner_replies.comment:
Hello Dustin, 

Let me first start by saying thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We take the experience you described very seriously. We have addressed this with the entire team that handled you during your visit. We apologize for the lack on all the fronts you mentioned, especially the time you had to wait. We will use this as on-going training to ensure our team does not repeat these mistakes.  I would like to personally invite you and guest back in hopes we get a second opportunity to make things right.  I can be reached at info@rowdytigeratl.com at any time to connect.  

DW

comment.text: I remember coming here and having the of my life thanks to Johnny Tam at the bar! I can't believe it's been like two years and he remembers our last encounter down to my favorite drink! He is an amazing asset to this restaurant and I hope management knows that. I'll highly recommend and will definitely return.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for visiting and recognizing Johnny during your recent breakfast experience. We appreciate you stopping in and look forward to the next time.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I went here for breakfast with my coworker and the food was good, and the service was great. Mahalet was our server and she was exceptional. When you travel a lot and are away from home you appreciate good people who are professional engaging and care about earning your business. If you are in town I highly recommend you pay this place a visit.

owner_replies.comment:
I am grateful for your review and it is fantastic to see such great commentary about your breakfast experience. We appreciate your recognition of Mahalet and we will share this her personally and the rest of our team. Thank you for the recommendation and hopefully see you soon again, should your travels bring you back to Midtown Atlanta.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Rowdy Tiger hosted our Red Bull 2020 kick off meetings and they were a pleasure to work with! The cocktails were great, the staff was friendly and Okan, the Director of Food and Beverage was incredible hospitable. I'd recommend dinner, drinks or hosting an event here!

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for the recognition of our team and especially our Food & Beverage Director Okan Hazar. I am sorry that I did not meet you in person during your events, as I was out of town. However, I am thrilled you enjoyed all your interactions with our team. Your recommendation means a lot to us, as well as your business.
We sincerely look forward to the next time.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager (Hotel)

comment.text:
A MUST Visit!

My husband and I from LA went to Rowdy Tiger with a good friend who is also a local. We had such a great experience; the food was AMAZING, the drinks were delicious and the dessert was incredible! We started out with the BOURBON MOLASSES GLAZED CHICKEN WINGS which had a delicious sauce (not overly sauced either which was great) and the perfect amount of spice. For dinner, my husband and friend had the BOURBON ANGUS BURGER and I had the PARMESAN HERB ROASTED CAULIFLOWER and SHE-CRAB soup. I have had she-crab soup all over the country and this one was by far the best! Creamy with lumps of she-crab and a delicious base. We topped off our evening with the chocolate mousse cake for my husband's birthday which he devoured. Overall we had an amazing experience, great food, great atmosphere, great drinks, and great company! I definitely recommend this place; Chef Chris has created an incredible menu with something for everyone!

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate the best wishes and recommendation all the way from L.A. I trust that when you visit your local friend again in the future that we will see you again. We will share your awesome comments with the team. 
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I had a reservation for Rowdy Tiger at 9:45 PM, and I arrived at around 9:48 PM. I walked in, and proceeded to wait at the host stand for about 7 min. Several staff members and servers had walked past during that time and saw me and my boyfriend waiting, but no one said a word. Finally, a short blonde haired staff member came up to us and said "what can we do for y'all". I told her we had a reservation and she looked baffled. Her response was "for dinner?", I told her yes and she left without another word. Two min later my boyfriend and I saw her back behind the bar doing what she was doing before she approached us. We then decided to dine somewhere else, which is unfortunate because I was excited about trying this place. To say it was a disappointment is an understatement. Judging from their terrible staff and lack of urgency and care for guests, this place will be closed soon.

First, i would like to apologize for waiting this long to follow up with my second experience at Rowdy Tiger. I had the opportunity to meet with Mr. Whitman. He was very friendly and professional. This time the service and food were immaculate! I really enjoyed the waiter. She was straight forward and honest. Love it! Sorry i didn't get a chance to take pictures of my food. I forgot to take a picture of my plate but That Rib-eye was on point!!. Thank you again for giving us a second shot. We will be back when rooftop is open again.

I have been to Rowdy Tiger 5 times over the past two months.1st time My family attended dinner one night while in the city and we really enjoyed the food and atmosphere. we have enjoyed it so much that we have had two event at the restaurant. 60th Birthday dinner for my mother in law in June and a 30th birthday celebration in August for the wife! The rooftop area is one of the best in the city. The entire staff is amazing and my family I'll forever be patrons at the Rowdy Tiger.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for the glowing review! I'm thrilled to read about how wonderful your dining experience has been with us. 
Thanks for choosingÂ Rowdy Tiger Whiskey Bar & Kitchen. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

comment.text: This review is solely based on the upstairs bar area. The service is not great. I was brushed off and spoken down to. The upstairs area is pretty nice but they could definitely do more with the space. The drinks are definitely not cheap. Overall, I don't see myself coming back.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for stopping by. We appreciate your visit. I am sorry that we did not live up to your expectations. Your comments will be used as a teachable moment for our team. I hope we can welcome you again in the future.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: We came for the bottomless mimosas brunch and left having some of Atlanta's best food. I highly recommend the short rib poutine. It was outstanding.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your recommendation. We thank you for your recent visit.
The poutine is one of our favorites as well and has become a staple. 
We look forward seeing you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Stopped by to see what whiskey options were available. Not an extensive list as the name trying to claim and the prices are double what other bars are one block over.  So have no plans to return but now I know.

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate your visit and your constructive feedback.
We will share comments with our team, but hope you will once again give us a try in the future.
We look forward to it.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
I had dinner here last night with 5 of my girlfriends. We were the only table around 8 o'clock. Our sever, Tony, was extremely rude to me when I asked if I could sample some wine before deciding (mind you I'm absolutely okay with an establishment denying me samples). Instead, before me and my friends could finish asking for wine to sample, Tony walks away as soon as I asked for Prosecco. It took him what felt like 15mins to come back with my sample. He leaves AGAIN before we could order. When he arrives to take our order he rudely asked me, " so you didn't like the Prosecco?". Unbelievable. Me and my friends just looked at each other in disbelief. We had complimentary cornbread which was delicious but our main courses were mediocre. I had the Arugula Caesar salad. The chicken was dry as rubber and the dressing needed more salt. My girlfriend who ordered the same dish agreed. I got to try my friends Brussels sprouts which were over cooked. Once we got our bill we saw a 20% gratuity charge included in our bill. It clicked in our heads why the waiter took an eternity to serve ONE table. Needless to say, I won't be recommending this establishment to my family, friends, or patients. 

Side note: me and my friend drove around 4 times to find the validated parking deck the receptionist told us about over the phone. Unfortunately we couldn't find it so we parked at a public parking garage that costed $7.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for reaching out. We sincerely appreciate your visit and feedback. 
I am sorry that you and your friends did not enjoy the experience as much.
We would love to talk to you in person, so when time allows could you contact our Food & Beverage Director Okan for follow up. Much appreciated.
As a side note, regarding valet parking. This service is provided right at the front door of the hotel next door. Your ticket will be validated for 3 hours when visiting the restaurant.
Stay well, and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Our first impression of the restaurant was nothing short of amazing from the atmosphere to the food. Upon being seated we were immediately greeted by our server Tony. He was very nice, funny and also gave great recommendations on appetizers. We tried the fried green tomato caprese, which were so tasty and the pickled deviled eggs. We were also greeted by Chef Christina whom gave a great recommendation to try the bourbon short ribs. This was my favorite, the short ribs were amazingly tender, flavorful with a slight crisp from the collard greens. I can honestly say this restaurant has got it right and I can't wait to come back. Lastly for dessert I had the bread budding also amazing. After dinner we decided to head upstairs to check out the rooftop and just as you would expect, it's beautiful! Filled with nice decor, a view and a few games.

owner_replies.comment:
WOW, we appreciate all the feedback. Thanks for recognizing Tony and we are thrilled you enjoyed his and Chef Chris' recommendations. Keep an eye out for our soon-to-come Thursday Game Nights on the Rowdy Rooftop and of course Whiskey Wednesdays. See you soon again.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Great food and excellent service Neicey was amazing and very attentive! I will definitely frequent rowdy tiger!

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate your future loyalty in advance and are thrilled that you enjoyed this visit. We appreciate the recognition and recommendation. See you soon.
Stay well.
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
Let me tell you about Maisha and Walter... whenever I'm in town I stop in here and they make you feel at home and just take the best care of you. The whole team here is really just the epitome of what southern hospitality should look like. The food is great and the drinks are great but the service is unmatched in the area and I've given almost every place a try. 

Not your typical hotel bar/restaurant/lounge. Stop in and see what I mean.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for recognizing our team members. We sincerely appreciate your visit and review and are delighted that you enjoyed the experience. We look forward to the next time. 
Stay well, 
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: We randomly came across this place while walking but omg the food was great and the drinks were even better. Even though the place was a little busy the bartender Jonny was amazing and so attentive. I'm definitely coming back!

The Rowdy Tiger is a great spot in town. It's has an amazing atmosphere and a great service. Alex and  Nicole took extraordinary care of us, they were very attentive, professional and affective. I certainly recommend this place and I will undoubtedly come back myself.

owner_replies.comment:
We look forward seeing you again the next time you are town. Thank you for your recent visit and commentary. We appreciate the recommendation and 5-stars.
See you soon.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Fantastic service at The Rowdy Tiger. Had a White Russian made by Alex and it was fantastic. Alex was witty and very welcoming, ask for him!

owner_replies.comment:
We are thrilled you enjoyed the libations and Alex' service. Thanks for stopping in and taking the time to provide you feedback. We look forward to your next visit.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: No trip to ATL is complete without coming to Rowdy Tiger for breakfast. This time, I brought a coworker one day and came back with my cousin the next. Johnny and Mahelet are the reason I make certain to visit every time I come in. The coffee is strong and the service is amazing.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your loyalty and return visits. We appreciate the recognition of our team members and will share your comments.
We look forward to the next time.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Terrible service, we made a reservation through open table was seated. Waited 15 minutes no one came to table so we mention to the hostess that no one had came yet. She said she would get someone, waited another 10minutes no one came. We noticed it people that were sat after us was getting service. We left after making the manager aware of the horrible service. We did not eat here, we are gay with a 3 year old from NC. I am not sure if that had anything to do with it but we took our money else where. Unfortunately we do not recommend this establishment for anyone

owner_replies.comment:
Dear Peter, 

Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We are sorry that we failed to meet your expectations and assure you that we have a zero tolerance policy for discrimination of any kind. We invite you to reach out to our restaurant leader Damien personally at info@rowdytigeratl.com if you'd like to discuss further, as we'd love the opportunity to learn more about what we could have done better in your situation so we can improve in the future. We realize you aren't local to Atlanta, but if there's anything we can do to make up for your experience we'd love to try.

comment.text: Bern in Stlants for 2 days and lvg tomorrow. The best part of my trip has been my visit at the rowdy tiger. Although we stayed at the hotel we never ste there till tonight.  Big mistake. Maisha recommended collard greens wings and mac and check all out of this world. I did not plan on drinking till she recommended bourbon peach smash. Maisha made our trip. The best meal and drink we had in Atlanta. Her service was perfect. Please stop by you will not be disappointed. Make sure you ask for Maisha she will make your night.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you so very much for the recognition and for your visit.
We will share your comments with Maisha and  the culinary team as well.
We trust we can serve you again in the future.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I am a frequent guest at the Rowdy Tiger and the Renaissance Atlanta Midtown Hotel.  I have always had great experiences at the Rowdy Tiger and its predecessor.  The bar tenders and severs always remember me by name and are alway spot on with the drinks that I like.  It is so nice to feel so welcome at a hotel bar and restaurant.  I have had awesome service from Johnny, Maisha, and Walter over the past several months.  Food wise, the Caesar salad is wonderful and the deviled eggs are a nice simple snack.  Drink wise, the whisky selection is good and they also stock a nice selection of gins.  I look forward to my next visit in a few weeks.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your loyalty, feedback and recognition. We will share your comments with our team. We are thrilled you enjoy the menu option and the services by our great staff.
We look forward to your next visit.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Had drinks & snacks here last night. Great experience! I love the ambience of the spot and will definitely be back!!

owner_replies.comment:
We look forward seeing you back in the near future. Thanks for stopping by and your quick review.
Check out our Whiskey Wednesdays or our Saturday Brunch LIVE. See you soon.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: What a great bar!  Our bartender Alex was the absolute BEST and was one of the many reasons we continued to come back during our stay at the hotel. The food was great, the atmosphere was casual and nice but the star-tender Alex stole the show hands down. (In all fairness, the entire bar staff was phenomenal). I highly recommend this venue and will hopefully be back if my travels bring me back to Atlanta.

Picked the place for the whiskey collection. First couple of choices are not available. Little disappointed but found some bourbons to order with a single large rock. The drinks show up with small cubes and the waitress says they are out of big cubes. How do you run a whiskey joint without big rocks? 
We order some appetizers to share among the group and the waitress does not have the sense to bring us some sharing plates. We found a manager (Glen) who brings us plates and says he will comp the drinks because of the big rock snafu.
We cash out the check and the waitress has added the comped drinks to the check against the manager's order.
We track the manager down and he takes it off.
Overall, extremely disappointed with service, bar's capacity to serve up whiskeys and waitress was sub par.

We chatted with Glen on the way out and he said he was new, asked us to come back in a couple of months. He had the right attitude, so we may give him another chance, but tonight's experience was disappointing

owner_replies.comment:
We look forward to our next opportunity to serve you. Thank you for your feedback and conversation with Glenn. I am sorry that you were disappointed this past time, but am confident that you will enjoy your next experience.
See you soon.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Ingredient is fresh. The flavor is a little too salty. The interior is nice. Overall, it is a good restaurant but pricy.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for visiting and for your feedback. We sincerely appreciate it and look forward seeing you again in the future.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Had mother's day brunch with family today and sadly was not impressed with food. Family order different items, Omelets and French Toast. I would have been ok with the small portion size served if food was better tasting. Unfortunately It was average at best. Given small portion size, average taste and high relative cost, not a great value. On the positive side, restaurant ambience was nice and staff was very attentive.

owner_replies.comment:
Hello David, 

Thank you for taking the time to review us.  I am the new Director of Food & Beverage for the Hotel and Restaurant. I wanted to reach out to you about your Mother's Day Brunch experience.  I truly appreciate your feedback.  That weekend of Mother's Day we rolled out a new breakfast/brunch menu and had some challenges. I would love the opportunity to have you and a guest back for brunch on me, and have you experience us the way thing should have been for you. Please don't hesitate to reach out to me at info@rowdytigeratl.com to take me up on this.  I hope to hear back from you.

comment.text: Great atmosphere with a great twist on fun southern cuisine!!!!  Love the whiskey choices as well.

owner_replies.comment:
Terrific news. Check out our daily Happy Hours and Whiskey Wednesdays as well.
Thanks for the recent visit and see you soon. Cheers.
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Okan and the service staff provided us exceptional service for an event we held at the Rowdy Tiger. The setup of appetizers was great and having a hands on experience with the service staff to provide drinks to the group was a great touch. Thank you for a great evening and we will be back for future events!!! I

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you so very kindly for your business and feedback. We sincerely appreciate the recognition of Okan and the rest of the team. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the experience with your group and look forward serving and welcoming you again in the near future.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Southern hospitality at its finest!!  Thank you so much to Raymond and Carolyn for making our group's first stop in Atlanta a memorable one! Great food, great drinks and even better service!!!

owner_replies.comment:
Terrific news. Our team thanks you for the recognition and we are delighted you enjoyed the experience.
Until the next time........
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Just awesome! Came here with my mom friends and was pleasantly surprised. The restaurant and rooftop were recently remodeled and they look amazing! Food and service were great and we all had a great time. Will definitely be back. Kudos to the manager!

owner_replies.comment:
Glad we were able to surprise you pleasantly and that you enjoyed the new experience.
Bring mom and your friends the next time for a Saturday Brunch LIVE. We look forward seeing you again.
Thank you for stopping by.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: This is the first time we've visited this location since it was called Community Smith. Glad to say the new vibe and ambiance is great. Raymond, our bartender was incredible. He was very helpful and his drinks were great. Would definitely come back to visit.
